Because of its spectacular view and quaint atmosphere, the location is also a treasure for nature enthusiasts. Distance from Chandigarh- 75.2 km via Bhoj Nagar-Chakki Mod Rd and NH 5 17. Nahan (85.2 km): Best Hill Stations Near Chandigarh within 100 kms Nahan: Hill Stations Near Chandigarh within 100 kms Nahan, the capital of the former Sirmur Princely State, is a small and very beautiful Himachal Pradesh hill station. Morni Hills Frequently Asked Questions for Hill Stations Near Chandigarh What are the most extraordinary hill stations near Chandigarh? Despite the numerous hill stations near Chandigarh, Solan, Barog, Chail, and Morni Hills are some of the extraordinary and off-beat hill stations. Are there any romantic hill stations near Chandigarh? Some of the best romantic hill towns near Chandigarh are Manali, Dalhousie, and Shimla. Is Kasol the same as Kasauli? No, Kasol and Kasauli are 2 different towns. Kasauli is only about 58 kilometers away, whereas Kasol is about 270 kilometers away and requires an overnight journey of about 8.5 hours from Chandigarh. Is there any snowy hill station near Chandigarh? Snow can be found in the following locations in late December or early January:1.      Shimla2.      Mussoorie3.      Manali4.      Mcleodganj5.      Lansdowne What is the distance between Lansdowne and Chandigarh? Lansdowne is approximately 307 kilometers from Chandigarh. To get to this location, take a bus or a cab.
